Package com.example.maxintegersolver.mocks

Class MockFactory

java.lang.Object
com.example.maxintegersolver.mocks.MockFactory
public class MockFactory extends Object
The MockFactory class is a utility class for creating mock objects for testing. It provides static methods to generate various mock objects and data structures, commonly used across different test cases.

This class is essential for unit tests, where predefined inputs and expected outputs are necessary to validate the behavior of the components under test.
